description: Allows the wither to launch random attacks.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Wither Random Attack Pos Goal Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the wither to launch random attacks. Can only be used by the Wither Boss.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
